channel.title: forms-api on tanaike
channel.description: Recent content in forms-api on tanaike

item.title: GitHub: Google Forms API Apps Script Web app
item.description: The sample scripts for using Google Forms API have been published by cschalk-goog. The scripts include the method for basically requesting to Forms API. This information will be very useful for a lot of users. https://github.com/googleworkspace/apps-script-samples/tree/master/forms-api/demos/AppsScriptFormsAPIWebApp

item.title: Using Google Forms API with Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists On October 12, 2021, Google Forms API had been announced. Ref On December 7, 2021, Google Forms API had been released as open beta. Ref In the current stage, when the users join the Early Adopter Program, they can use Google Forms API of the beta version. Ref By using Google Forms API, what Google Forms service cannot achieve got to be able to be achieved by Google Forms API.

item.title: Google Forms API now available in open beta
item.description: Now, Google Forms API can be used in open beta. The official post is https://workspaceupdates.googleblog.com/2021/12/google-forms-api-now-available-in-open.html. Official document of Forms API
